mapper.select: SELECT vc.*, u.username as username, u.name as user_name, approver.name as approver_name, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.activity_id) FROM signup_twb s WHERE s.user_id = vc.user_id AND s.status = 'APPROVED' AND s.signed_in = 1 AND s.signed_out = 1 AND DATE(s.sign_in_time) BETWEEN vc.start_date AND vc.end_date) as completed_activity_count, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, s.sign_in_time, s.sign_out_time)), 0) FROM signup_twb s WHERE s.user_id = vc.user_id AND s.status = 'APPROVED' AND s.signed_in = 1 AND s.signed_out = 1 AND DATE(s.sign_in_time) BETWEEN vc.start_date AND vc.end_date) as total_service_hours FROM cert_twb vc LEFT JOIN user_twb u ON vc.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_twb approver ON vc.approver_id = approver.id WHERE vc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY vc.created_at DESC
